Name: Thermal Load IPH

Caption.String: The thermal load is assumed to be a heating load that can be partially or fully offset by heat generated by a combined heat and power process.
In Value mode, the growth rate applies to the previous year's annual MMBtu load starting in Year 2. In Schedule mode, each year's rate applies to the Year 1 MMBtu value. See Help for details.
Normalize supplied load profile to monthly thermal data

Description.String: Type a load growth rate (%) for each year. Each year's growth rate applies to the total annual load in Year 1.
The thermal load is specified as the average thermal power over the time interval.  For hourly load data, this is equivalent to entering thermal usage in each hour, in MMBtu/hr
